quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Gilmore Girls and Lorelai
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, chicken, cartoon. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Family Guy is a part of Adult Swims original programming.
Which two of Lorelais loves on Gilmore Girls allow their daughters to interfere with their relationship with Lorelai?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Luke and Chris

questions.question: What reason did TV character Lorelai Gilmore give for not marrying Chris the first time he proposed?

options.text: You need to find out what youre going to do with your life.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All of these

questions.question: Why wasnt Chris the perfect man for Lorelai in the series Gilmore Girls?

options.text: He had a hard time dealing with a man/woman friendship.
She was on the rebound and still loved Luke.
They both moved too fast and married even though they both knew that they had issues needing to be resolved.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All of these

questions.question: Which one of Lorelais loves on Gilmore Girls had a thing about having someone sleeping next to him at night?
The last episode of The Saint aired in this year, which coincided with the premiere of On Her Majestys Secret Service, the sixth James Bond movie.
Cartoon Networks first program that was geared more toward the adult audience was Space Ghost: Coast to Coast.
On the TV show Gilmore Girls, Lorelai broke off (at least once) with which of her loves?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All of these

questions.question: Best known for personifying Miss Moneypenny in the James Bond movies, this Canadian actress starred several times in the British television series The Saint.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Lois Maxwell

questions.question: Williams Street Studios produces Adult Swim programming.
Which of her loves was Lorelai able to hide from her parents on the TV show Gilmore Girls?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: None of these

questions.question: Who created the show Robot Chicken which first aired on Adult Swim?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Seth Green

questions.question: Which of her loves did Lorelai leave at the altar in the TV series Gilmore Girls?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: None of these

questions.question: Think about the characters of Chris, Jason and Luke on Gilmore Girls. What is specific about Lorelais relationships?

options.text: She obviously goes for a specific type of man, all three seem to fit together.
While their personalities are similar they are physically very different.
While physically similar (dark hair, tall, good looking), they are three very different personality types.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: While physically similar (dark hair, tall, good looking), they are three very different personality types.

questions.question: Lorelai and Luke reconciled at the end of the series Gilmore Girls?

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Battlestar Galactica and Series
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, opening, shows. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: In the opening episode of season one of Battlestar Galactica, after how many minutes would the cylons find Galactica?

options.text: every half hour on the hour

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: every 33 minutes

questions.question: What happened to Battlestar Galactica character Admiral Cain?

options.text: She was relieved of command by President Roslyn.
She gave up her command and leads a quiet life as a civilian.
She was shot by a cylon.
She deserted and her whereabouts remain unknown.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: She was shot by a cylon.

questions.question: What is the relation between Battlestar Galactica characters Lee Apollo Adama and William Adama?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: They are son and father

questions.question: What was the name of the man in the Buffy series, who ran the runaway center, which in reality was a demon dimension where runaways worked until they were too old to be useful?
What animated series on Adult Swim centers around the day-to-day activities of a law firm staffed mainly by superheroes/villains from 1960s era cartoons?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Harvey Birdman

questions.question: In Buffy the Vampire Slayer, which of these is NOT on Ozs list of different types of parties?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: a blow-out

questions.question: What is the name of the mythic home planet which is the birthplace and original home of humanity in the series Battlestar Galactica?
Most of the shows on Adult Swim are only 11 minutes long aired in 15 minute blocks. Which of the following groups consists of shows that are actually 22 minutes long and air in 30 minute blocks?

options.text: Johnny Bravo, The Oblongs, Sealab 2021, Space Ghost and ATHF
Family Guy, Futurama, Bleach, The Oblongs and The Boondocks
Frisky Dingo, Bleach, Harvey Birdman, ATHF and Bleach
ATHF, Moral Orel, Frisky Dingo, The Venture Bros. and Space Ghost

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Family Guy, Futurama, Bleach, The Oblongs and The Boondocks

questions.question: What classic monster does Pete, Debbies jealous and abusive boyfriend in season 3 of Buffy the Vampire Slayer, closely resemble?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dr Jekyll and Mr Hyde

questions.question: How many cylon models are there in the series Battlestar Galactica?
What is the model number of the cylon that Prof. Baltar sees in his mind in Battlestar Galactica?
The main characters in the series Battlestar Galactica were sure of the existence of Earth.
In Battlestar Galactica, humans are monotheistic, and the cylons worship many gods of Greek mythology.
What is the name of the animated series on Adult Swim that stars Killface, Xander Crews/Awesome X and the Xtacles?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Frisky Dingo

questions.question: Can you name the members of the Griffin family on the series Family Guy?

options.text: Brian, Peter, Lois, Meg, Tom and Glenn
Peter, Lois, Chirs, Meg, Stewie and Brian
Cleveland, Lois, Chirs, Tom, Stewie and Brian
Peter, Lois, Joe, Glenn, Stewie and Brian

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Peter, Lois, Chirs, Meg, Stewie and Brian

questions.question: When Buffy the Vampire Slayer temporarily loses her slaying powers, how does she manage to defeat the vampire Kralik?

options.text: She burns down the house hes in.
She tricks him into drinking Holy Water.
She gets her powers back in the nick of time, and easily stakes him.
She is barely able to decapitate him with an ax.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: She tricks him into drinking Holy Water.

options.text: They performed a spell, and the mummy told them.
